title: PUB
content:
Hi there

Can anyone tell me what font they use on this site as the Main Serif, Avant Garde/Akzidenz looking kind of font,

[http://pub.se/#/framsidan/2007-11-29/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107215914/http:/pub.se/#/framsidan/2007-11-29/ "http://pub.se/#/framsidan/2007-11-29/")

THanks

Matt
author: Matt Squire

comments.content:
Really, oh my god

Thanks I will check it out
… but you wouldn’t call that a serif. ;°)

oh yeah, sorry, I was in a Serif frame of mind and was confusing things,

well spotted

It can be actually Avenir Next as it seems the Ultralight style is used on the website...

[http://www.linotype.com/90672/avenirnext-family.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107215914/http:/www.linotype.com/90672/avenirnext-family.html "http://www.linotype.com/90672/avenirnext-family.html")
